actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-595.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 253 - 159 (Record Vote No: 103).

official_title: A resolution providing for correcting the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 3) to enhance the competitiveness of American industry, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 3 (trade law revisions) as it concerns a review to assess whether existing restrictions on the export of U.S. crude oil are adequate to protect the energy and national security interests of the United States and American consumers.

titles.title: A resolution providing for correcting the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 3) to enhance the competitiveness of American industry, and for other purposes.
